properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
1. GUNNERY EXERCISES 0630Z TO 2100Z DAILY
   21 THRU 24, 28 FEB THRU 03 MAR,
   AND 07 THRU 10 MAR, AND 0630Z TO 1630Z
   DAILY 25 FEB AND 04 MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
   39-42.8N 008-26.8E, 39-42.8N 008-23.2E,
   39-44.3N 008-22.5E, 39-46.0N 008-22.7E,
   39-47.5N 008-23.8E, 39-48.5N 008-25.2E,
   39-49.0N 008-28.0E, 39-48.1N 008-30.0E,
   39-44.2N 008-28.9E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 102200Z MAR 22.
